title: Anemarrhena asphodeloides Bunge polysaccharides alleviate lipoteichoic acid-induced lung inflammation and modulate gut microbiota in mice
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Yuqi Wen, Hidayat Ullah, Renzhen Ma, Nabeel Ahmad Farooqui, Jiaxin Li, Yamina Alioui, Juanjuan Qiu
